title: The Magic Trumpet
creator_credit: Dusan Marek, Eltham Films and Anim-ad Films
brief_description: An experimental film using mainly animated paper cut-outs to tell the story of a magic trumpet which brings fame and fortune to an old tramp. Story script by Tim Burstall, music by Michael Kenny and montage, animation and photography by Dusan Marek.
creator_credit_for_label: Dusan Marek, Eltham Films and Anim-ad Films
description: An experimental film using mainly animated paper cut-outs to tell the story of a magic trumpet which brings fame and fortune to an old tramp. Story script by Tim Burstall, music by Michael Kenny and montage, animation and photography by Dusan Marek.
